title: RSS feed for ARD Audiothek podcasts
author: Tom
readme:
This workflow builds a valid RSS feed (which is an XML feed under the hood) for ARD Audiothek podcasts. This allows you to subscribe to such podcasts using your favourite podcatcher without using the ARD Audiothek app.

The example builds a feed for Kalk & Welk, but the workflow can be easily adjusted by providing another podcast URL on the _Get overview page_ HTTP Request node.

To subscribe to the feed, active your n8n workflow and then use the **Production URL** from the intitial Feed Webhook node in your podcatcher.

I've tested the resulting feed using [Pocket Casts](https://pocketcasts.com/)...  
![grafik.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/grafik_9957b88da3.png)

...and [Miniflux](https://miniflux.app/):  
![grafik.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/grafik_638b6efcfa.png)

When using Miniflux, you can add your feed via [this page](https://pocketcasts.com/submit/) to your account. Make sure you select **Private** when doing so to avoid sharing your n8n instance with the world.

The resulting feed passes the [W3C Feed Validation Service](https://validator.w3.org/feed/):

![grafik.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/grafik_94307e4b69.png)

The workflow can also be used as a foundation to free other podcasts from propriertary big media platforms, though not all of them will be as simple to deal with as the ARD Audiothek.
readme_zh:
此工作流为ARD Audiothek播客构建了一个有效的RSS订阅源（底层实为XML格式），使您无需使用ARD Audiothek应用，即可通过喜爱的播客客户端订阅节目。

示例中创建的是《Kalk & Welk》节目的订阅源，但只需在"_获取概览页_"HTTP请求节点中替换其他播客URL，即可轻松适配其他节目。

订阅该订阅源时，请先激活您的n8n工作流，然后在播客客户端中使用初始Feed Webhook节点提供的**生产环境URL**。

我已通过[Pocket Casts](https://pocketcasts.com/)...  
![grafik.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/grafik_9957b88da3.png)  

和[Miniflux](https://miniflux.app/)测试了生成的订阅源：  
![grafik.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/grafik_638b6efcfa.png)  

使用Miniflux时，可通过[此页面](https://pocketcasts.com/submit/)将订阅源添加到账户，务必选择**私有**选项以避免您的n8n实例被公开访问。

生成的订阅源已通过[W3C订阅源验证服务](https://validator.w3.org/feed/)检测：  
![grafik.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/grafik_94307e4b69.png)  

该工作流亦可作为基础模板，用于从其他商业媒体平台解放播客内容，尽管并非所有平台都能像ARD Audiothek这样简便处理。
